author: James Wythe
name: Colourful Lentil Soup
notes: You can try this recipe as is or with a cauliflower topping. If you don't want to have the cauliflower topping you can skip step 1

ingredients.name: potatoes
ingredients.notes: You can also use sweet potatoes

ingredients.name: red split lentils
ingredients.notes: You can also use other types of lentils. Some lentils take longer to cook (for example brown lentils)

notes: This step is optional, you can have the soup without the cauliflower

tasks.name: Pre heat the oven to 180 C
Chop the cauliflower into florets
Place the florets on a baking tray
Sprinkle olive oil along with the smoked paprika until lightly covered
Place in the oven for 45 minutes (make sure to turn half way)
Weigh 450 g of potatoes
notes: You will no longer need the scale

tasks.name: Peel and chop the potatoes into small cubes and place them in a large bowl
notes: You will no longer need the peeler

tasks.name: Thinly slice 3 - 4 carrots and place them in the same bowl
Thinly slice 2 celery stalcks and place them in the same bowl and set aside
Prepare 1.5 L stock according to the pack instructions and set aside
Peel and slice 1 onion and place it in a small bowl and set aside
Peel and crush 2 garlic cloves
notes: You will no longer need the knife and chopping board

tasks.name: Place a large plan over medium heat
Add 2 tbsps olive oil
notes: You will no longer need the tbsp

tasks.name: Add the crushed garlic
Add a pinch of salt
Add a pinch of pepper
Stir well
Fry the garlic for a couple of minutes
Once the garlic is sizzling add the onion
Cook for 2 minutes until the onion softens
Add the potatoes, carrots and celery
Add a pinch of salt
Add a pinch of pepper
Fry for for 5-10 minutes until the vegetables have softened
Add the stock
Add 1 cup of red split lentils
Bring to a boil
Once boiling place the lid on the pan
Reduce the heat to medium/low
Set aside to simmer for 20 minutes
Remove the soup from heat
In a bowl serve the soup
Add some cauliflower if using
Enjoy!

items.name: Pot
items.notes: large enough to hold 250 g pasta

tasks.name: Place a pot of water on high heat and set aside to boil
Chop a handful of olives
Place a sauce pan over medium heat
Drizzle with 3 tbsps of olive oil
Once the pan is hot, add 250 g of cherry tomatoes and mix well
notes: Keep the tomatoes whole as this speeds up the recipe

tasks.name: Add the chopped olives to the pan and mix
Now set the pan aside for the tomatoes and olives to fry for approximately 5 minutes
Meanwhile crush 4 large garlic cloves and set aside
notes: You will no longer need the knife and chopping board

tasks.name: In a pinch bowl add 1 tsp of paprika
In the same pinch bowl add 1/2 tsp of chilli flakes
notes: You can add more or less chilli flakes, depending on how spicy you want the sauce

tasks.name: Add the crushed garlic cloves to the pan
Add the spices and mix well
Using a fork pinch and squash the tomatoes
Mix well and set aside to simmer over low heat for approximately 10 minutes
In the pot with boiling water, add salt
Add the pasta
Reduce the heat to medium
Boil for approximately ten minutes until the pasta is al dente
Remove the sauce from the heat
Add in a hanful of basil and stir until it wits
Remove the pasta from the heat
Bring the pasta pot close to the sauce pan
Using tongs directly place the pasta from the boiling water into the sauce
Mix the pasta with the sauce until the pasta is fully covered
Serve in a plate adding some fresh basil on top
Enjoy!

ingredients.name: flour
ingredients.notes: I use gluten free self-raising flour

ingredients.name: Oil
ingredients.notes: For frying. I use coconut oil

items.name: small bowl
items.notes: Optional. To hold the flour. You can also add it directly to the batter

items.name: 1/4 measuring cup
items.notes: I use this to pour the pancake mix

tasks.name: In a measuring jar, add 140 - 150 ml plant based milk and set aside
In a bowl add 100 g flour and set aside
notes: You will no longer need the scale

tasks.name: Peel 2 ripe bananas
Add the bananas to a large bowl
Mash the bananas using a fork
notes: You will no longer need the fork

tasks.name: To the mashed bananas add 1 tsp cinnamon
Add 1 tsp baking powder
notes: You will no longer need the tsp

tasks.name: Add the flour
Add 1 tbsp maple syrup
notes: You will no longer need the tbsp

tasks.name: Add the plant based milk
Then, using a hand whisk, mix well
notes: You will no longer need the hand whisk
This step is optional
You can add anything that you like instead of chocolate. For example strawberries, blueberries etc

tasks.name: Chop 25 g of chocolate
Add the chocolate chunks to the batter and mix well
Place a frying pan over high heat
Once its hot, add approximately 1 tsp coconut oil and spread evenly
Reduce the heat to medium
Pour a small amount of pancake mix into the pan.
notes: I like to use a 1/4 size measuring cup to pour the pancake mix

tasks.name: Fry the pancake on either side for approximately 1.5 minutes until golden
Repeat the above step until all the pancake mix is finished

ingredients.name: rice noodles
ingredients.notes: You can also buy it precooked

ingredients.name: tamari
ingredients.notes: If you can't find tamari, and you are not gluten free you can use soy sauce instead

ingredients.name: miso paste
ingredients.notes: I use brown rice miso. If you can't find miso you can use a bit more tamari

tasks.name: Crush a handful of peanuts and set aside in a pinch bowl
Chop 1 broccoli head into small florets and place inside a bowl
Slice 1 bell pepper and place inside the same bowl
Place a pot of water on medium heat and set aside to boil
Add 1 tsp seasame oil in a small bowl
Add 3 tbsp maple syrup in the same bowl
Add 3 tbsp tamari in the same bowl
Add 1 heaped tsp miso paste in the same bowl
notes: If you are not using miso paste add a 1 tbsp tamari
You will no longer need the tsp

tasks.name: Then, using a hand whisk, mix well and set aside
notes: You will no longer need the hand whisk

tasks.name: Peel and slice 1 onion
Crush 1 large garlic clove
Slice and deseed half a red chilli
notes: You will no longer need the knife and chopping board

tasks.name: Place a frying pan over medium heat
Add 2 tbsps sesame oil
notes: You will no longer need the tbsp

tasks.name: Once the pan is hot add in the red onion, garlic and chilli
Fry for a couple minutes until softened
Now add the broccoli and bell pepper
Fry together for 5 minutes until softned
Add 150 g rice noodles to the boiling water
Reduce the heat to medium and set aside to boil for approximately 5 minutes
To the vegetables add a large handful of bean sprouts
Add the crushed peanuts
Squeeze a lime
Add the pad thai sauce and mix
Cook together for a couple minute
Add the noodles to the pan
Stir in to soak up all the sauce
Remove from the heat
Serve with extra bean sprouts, chilli, lime and crushed peanuts
Enjoy
